/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a few wispy clouds. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban landscape. On either side of the street, trees and bushes add a touch of greenery, contrasting with the concrete structures. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
